mapper.insert: insert into xjhb_project (id, name, start_time, project_application, end_time, period, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectApplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update xjhb_project set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_application = #{projectApplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, start_time, project_application, end_time, period, create_time from xjhb_project
